title: Drawing, "Design for Street Scene, for Othello", 1932
inscribed: Inscribed in white chalk, lower right: car[...] steps [?]
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Design of two building exteriors. On the left, larger building with two large arched entrances at the front, and three on the side, alongside stairs; second floor designated by five pointed arched windows, and third floor designated by a row of large arches at the front and side. On the right, narrow ornamented building façade with pedimented doorway and window above. One hole punch on left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Street Scene, for Othello", 1932.
1932. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-189.
